project.label: A Simple iDigi Short Messaging Service (SMS) Sample
project.description: An iDigi Dia project sample that shows how Dia can be used to upload channel updates or channel alarms to iDigi over SMS based on channel filters and an interval or a conditional value.

platforms.platform: ConnectPort X5 F ZB Wifi GPRS
ConnectPort X5 R ZB Wifi GPRS
ConnectPort X5 R ZB Wifi CDMA
ConnectPort X5 R Wifi GPRS Iridium
